Aloha Hostel - Hostel in Paris, France

 

Hostels > France hostels >  Île-de-France hostels >  Paris(75) hostels >  Paris hostels

Loading map...

Aloha Hostel 

Category: Hostel

Address: 1 rue Borromée - Paris, France

Starting from: 23.16 EUR

(indicative price per person, per night)

SEARCH

About the property

We know that travelling on a budget is demanding. In fact, Aloha's founders were once backpackers themselves. Hostel guests must be maximum 40 years old.

 

Accommodation

At Aloha we offer accommodation in charming, newly renovated rooms with traditional Parisian decor for 4 guests. Private double rooms are also available.

 

Common areas, services and activities

Free breakfast served each morning, fully equipped kitchen, information stand, friendly English-speaking staff and so on... And at night the fun begins at ALOHA, with cheap drinks, music and special events (like film night) in a cool and cosmopolitain atmosphere.

 

Surroundings

Centrally located, the hostel is within easy walking distance of Paris' most famous sights: The Eiffel Tower, the Arc de Triomphe, the Champs Elysées, The Musée Rodin, The Musée des Armées and the lively Boulevard Montparnasse. And with a Metro station only a stone's throw away from our door the rest of this fascinating city is yours to discover. Variety of supermarkets, laundromats, bakeries and a post office nearby.

 

Why you should stay here

Make your stay in Paris a memorable one, come to the friendliest hostel in town!

Check In

from 16:00 to 24:00

Check Out

before 11:00

Curfew

No curfew

Room Lockout

No lockout

Reception

24/7

Included Facilities and Services
BreakfastYES

Wi-Fi accessYES
Security boxes / LockersYES
Luggage storageYES
HeatingYES
LinenYES
TowelsYES
TVYES
FridgeYES

Available Amenities
KitchenYES
Parking lotNO

Important To Know

No wheelchair access
Children NOT accepted
Private rooms age restriction: from 16 years to 40 years
Dorms age restriction: from 16 years to 40 years
Smoking policy: All rooms and the common areas are NON smoking
Animals NOT accepted

Terms and conditions

The hostel accepts only cash payments for balance. Credit/Debit Cards NOT accepted.
Taxes not included: Tourist tax of 0,83€ per person per night will be charged on arrival.

Free cancellation at least 24 hours before arrival date, first night of stay fee for late cancellation or no show

Customer rating

83%

digest: Book online Aloha Hostel, among the best hostels and budget hotels in Paris. Rooms starting from 23€ per person. Over 86 reviews. Book Aloha Hostel now: it's cheap, safe and fast!
